title: Utilizing In-Context Learning for Software Engineering Knowledge Reasoning

context.prior_knowledge: Software development experience (2+ years), basic API usage experience, and proficiency in Python or Java programming languages
context.additional_context: Course focused on current practitioners mastering knowledge reasoning techniques using large-scale prior learning code models (PCM)

learning_goals: Learners can accurately infer the fully qualified name (FQN) of APIs in PCM tools like CoPilot
Learners can design optimal prompt configurations for FQN inference using in-context learning
Learners can systematically explain methods to evaluate software engineering knowledge embedded in PCM.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
